name: Ocean Turtle Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Check Ocean Turtle Survival Simulator 3D and enjoy amazing underwater world!

Do you like animal simulators? Be a turtle swimming over the sea! Find food to survive, hunt for small aquatic animals or start fishing. Avoid meeting with dangerous sea predators such as sharks, orcas and killer whales – they may attack a turtle or even kill it! Test your survival skill with Ocean Turtle Survival Simulator 3D – great game for those who loves aquatic animals!

Explore vast underwater as a turtle and get your survival skills to work! Avoid sharks, orcas and killer whales attack or battle against other sea creatures. Swim over the sea to find food – your main goal is to survive. Feed your turtle by fishing or hunting small aquatic animals. Underwater world might be more dangerous then it seems…Do you like aquatic animals? Feel like one of them with Ocean Turtle Survival Simulator 3D! Survive at all costs!

Don’t forget to maintain sea turtles health, energy and hunger rate – it’s the only way to survive in this cruel underwater world! Swim fast, avoid meeting with predators and feed your turtle by hunting or fishing! Enjoy this amazing animal simulator in 3D!

Ocean Turtle Survival Simulator 3D features:

- Play as a sea turtle exploring underwater world
- Avoid meeting aquatic predators like sharks, orcas or killer whales or battle against them
- Start fishing or hunting to get food to survive
- Amazing aquatic animal simulator in 3D

Try Ocean Turtle Survival Simulator 3D! Do you like animal games, underwater views and challenging missions? This survival simulator is made for you! Explore underwater being a turtle and have fun playing this amazing game in 3D!
